Spyder designers focus on developing and using the latest insulation technologies.

For example, the brand’s men’s Leader Jacket, Cosmos Jacket and Foreman Jacket all use Thinsulate Insulation, a top-of-the line thin, yet extra warm insulation. Spyder’s women’s Breaker Jacket uses PrimaLoft insulation, a revolutionary soft insulation that feels similar to down but remains water resistant in the wettest conditions.
